function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in non-contact community administrative office services","Impact":"Potential increase in the spread of contagious diseases due to increased interaction in non-contact settings","Mitigation":"Promotion of strict hygiene measures and disinfection protocols for non-contact administrative office services","Technologies":"Digital appointment systems, contactless payment, touchless interfaces","People":"Residents, administrative staff, visitors","Owner":"Community management, administrative staff"},{"Description":"Change in habits and reliance on non-contact administrative services","Impact":"Reduced utilization of physical administrative office facilities may lead to increased crowding in non-contact settings","Mitigation":"Monitoring and regulating crowd density, promoting staggered appointment schedules","Technologies":"Crowd monitoring systems, appointment scheduling software, occupancy sensors","People":"Residents, administrative staff, visitors","Owner":"Community management, administrative staff"},{"Description":"Adjustment of community office facilities to integrate non-contact and physical services","Impact":"Potential risk of cross-contamination between non-contact and physical administrative office services","Mitigation":"Segregation of non-contact and physical office areas, regular cleaning and disinfection protocols","Technologies":"Separate entrance and exit systems, UV sterilization systems, antimicrobial surfaces","People":"Residents, administrative staff, visitors","Owner":"Community management, administrative staff"}]}
